results.title: Attenuation of the pro-inflammatory signature of lung cancer-derived mesenchymal stromal cells by statins.
results.text_hl: In addition, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ inhibited spheroid formation by PCCs and negatively affected @<m>DISEASE_115700</m> @DISEASE_OMIM:115700 @@@PCC@@@ survival.
